data.weather: From the time of update today at 7.51 we have had a severe storm with high winds causing structural damage to buildings on course. The forecast is for winds to remain strong (50-60 mph) through today and tomorrow, thus the site has been deemed unsafe to stage a race meeting. We apologize for any inconvenience caused - safety is a priority. Total rainfall for this past week is 57 mm.
